#summary 如何通过源代码编译生成Micrite
#labels Phase-Implementation,Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =
下面的内容介绍如何从源代码编译生成Micrite


= 环境准备 =

要编译Micrite，需要安装下面的软件:
  * JDK 5.0+ (J2SE 1.5.0+) or compatible JDK 
  * Apache Maven version 2.0.9 (or newer) 
  * Subversion client version 1.2 (or newer, 1.4 is recommended)
